quotes.message: The practice of leadership is not the same as the exercise of power.
quotes.name: James Macgregor Burns

quotes.message: Only through practice and more practice, until you can do something without conscious effort.
quotes.name: Joe Hyams

quotes.message: Through practice, gently and gradually we can collect ourselves and learn how to be more fully with what we do.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: Everything we do is practice for something greater than where we currently are.
quotes.name: Adam Kirk Smith

quotes.message: We learn by practice. Whether it means to learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same. One becomes in some area an athlete of God.
quotes.name: Martha Graham

quotes.message: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
quotes.name: Herbie Hancock

quotes.message: Practice only makes for improvement.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
quotes.name: Sam Snead

quotes.message: Only by practice and non-attachment can we conquer mind.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Practice makes better and prayer makes perfect. The more we do, the easier it gets, and all the while praying perfects us in the art.
quotes.name: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.message: We need to learn how to honor and use a practice for as long as it serves us.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: Practice the art of patience for nature never acts in haste.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: Preaching is to much avail, but practice is far more effective. A godly life is the strongest argument you can offer the skeptic.
quotes.name: Hosea Ballou

quotes.message: What you practice, is what you'll do.
quotes.name: Benny Urquidez

quotes.message: Practice is everything. This is often misquoted as Practice makes perfect.
quotes.name: Periander

quotes.message: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.name: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.message: To practice the process of conflict resolution, we must completely abandon the goal of getting people to do what we want.
quotes.name: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.message: Practice means to perform, over and over again in the face of all obstacles, some act of vision, of faith, of desire. Practice is a means of inviting the perfection desired.
quotes.name: Martha Graham

quotes.message: The more you practice the better you'll be, the harder you train the great in you they'll see.
quotes.name: Alcurtis Turner

quotes.message: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
quotes.name: Hyman Rickover

quotes.message: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Practice like it's a game; play the game like it's practice.
quotes.name: Mike Candrea

quotes.message: Practice has a logic which is not that of the logician.
quotes.name: Pierre Bourdieu

quotes.message: We must patiently practice every day.
quotes.name: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.message: Practice makes comfort. Expand your experiences regularly so every stretch won't feel like your first.
quotes.name: Gina Greenlee

quotes.message: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: We are practicing what we preach so that we may preach what we practice.
quotes.name: Ralph Nader

quotes.message: Practice without improvement is meaningless.
quotes.name: Chuck Knox

quotes.message: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
quotes.name: Anton Chekhov

quotes.message: The goal of practice is always to keep our beginner's mind.
quotes.name: Jack Kornfield

quotes.message: I'm a strong believer that you practice like you play, little things make big things happen.
quotes.name: Tony Dorsett

quotes.message: Best practices are those practices that generally produce the best results or minimize risk.
quotes.name: Chad White

quotes.message: Preparation to success is hard work of daily practice with improvement.
quotes.name: Millie DeWitt

quotes.message: Practice is the hardest part of learning, and training is the essence of transformation.
quotes.name: Ann Voskamp

quotes.message: Practice what you know, and it will help to make clear what now you do not know.
quotes.name: Rembrandt

quotes.message: When you get to practice against the best, it brings the best out of you.
quotes.name: Marshawn Lynch

quotes.message: Practice presence embrace the place where life happens.
quotes.name: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.message: Practice should always be based upon a sound knowledge of theory.
quotes.name: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.message: Practice is the only norm for verifying truth.
quotes.name: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.message: It is not a matter of faith. It is a matter of practice.
quotes.name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.message: Don't misunderstand me. I don't believe in prayer. I only do it. Or perhaps it does me.
quotes.name: Sam Keen

quotes.message: It's not what you do once in a while, it's what you do day in and day out that makes the difference.
quotes.name: Jenny Craig

quotes.message: When you find your place where you are, practice occurs.
quotes.name: Eihei Dogen

quotes.message: Practice is the repeated effort to follow the disciplines which give permanent control of the thought-waves of the mind. Practice becomes firmly grounded when it has been cultivated for a long time, uninterruptedly, with earnest devotion.
quotes.name: Patanjali

quotes.message: Practice is the best of all instructors.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: He who knoweth the precepts by heart, but faileth to practice them, is like unto one who lighteth a lamp and the shutteth his eyes.
quotes.name: Nagarjuna

quotes.message: What you want to be eventually, that you must be every day; and by and by the quality of your deeds will get down into your soul.
quotes.name: Frank Crane

quotes.message: Exercise, exercise your powers; what is difficult will finally become routine.
quotes.name: Georg Lichtenberg

quotes.message: What makes a man a good artist, a good sculptor, a good musician? Practice. What makes a man a good linguist, a good stenographer? Practice. What makes a man a good man? Practice. Nothing else.
quotes.name: Henry Drummond

quotes.message: Practice makes permanent.
quotes.name: Jane Zimmerman

quotes.message: Practice not your art, and it will soon depart.
quotes.name: German Proverb

quotes.message: By nature, men are nearly alike; by practice, they get to be wide apart.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: A juggler's instant skill hath been long years a learning.
quotes.name: Martin Tupper

quotes.message: An ounce of practice is more than tons of preaching.
quotes.name: Gandhi

quotes.message: If I don't practice one day, I know it; two days the critics know it; three days, the public knows it.
quotes.name: Jascha Heifetz

quotes.message: I know you've heard it a thousand times before. But it's trueâ€”hard work pays off. If you want to be good, you have to practice, practice, practice. If you don't love something, then don't do it.
quotes.name: Ray Bradbury

quotes.message: There are only two sorts of doctors; those who practice with their brains, and those who practice with their tongues.
quotes.name: Sir William Osler

quotes.message: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: You don't need to justify your love, you don't need to explain your love, you just need to practice your love. Practice creates the master.
quotes.name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.message: Practice doesn't make perfect. Practice reduces the imperfection.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Do it again. Play it again. Sing it again. Read it again. Write it again. Sketch it again. Rehearse it again. Run it again. Try it again. Because again is practice, and practice is improvement, and improvement only leads to perfection.
quotes.name: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.message: You are what you practice most.
quotes.name: Richard Carlson

quotes.message: The mind is like tofu. It tastes like whatever you marinate it in.
quotes.name: Sylvia Boorstein

quotes.message: It's what you practice in private that you will be rewarded for in public.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins
